text: “Ngati anyalanyaza (Allah awalanga) sitidakutume kwa iwo kukhala muyang’aniri. Udindo wako ndikufalitsa uthenga. Ndipo ndithu tikamulawitsa munthu mtendere wochokera kwa Ife, akuunyadira (modzikweza), koma choipa chikawapeza kupyolera mzoipa zimene manja awo adatsogoza, pompo munthuyo sathokoza (Allah)
